extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This...\. this is it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est...\. C'est ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: My personal room.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mon bureau personnel.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Neat office!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Cool ton bureau !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Wow, a whole bonsai garden!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ouah, un vrai jardin de bonsaï !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Who?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Qui ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Oh...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oh...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Oh!\. What a pretty person!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oh !\. Elle est mignonne !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Somebody you know?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est quelqu'un que tu connais ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yeah...\. you could say that.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...\. On peut dire ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Manuela.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Manuela.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: She was a person I used to work with.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était une personne avec qui j'avais l'habitude de travailler.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: We were rather close.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On était assez proches.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Actually...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: D'ailleurs...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Lea...\. I think I told you about her several times, didn't I?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Lea...\. Je crois que je t'ai plusieurs fois parlé d'elle, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Huh.\. So why was I left out?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Hein.\. Et pourquoi pas à moi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It was long before Lea entered the Playground.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était longtemps avant que Lea entre dans le Terrain de Jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Back when she was created, when I entered the game as Sidwell.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était à l'époque où elle a été créée, quand j'étais dans le jeu en tant que Sidwell.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I actually spent a lot of time with Lea.\. Teaching her things.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: ... J'ai passé beaucoup de temps avec Lea.\. Pour lui apprendre des trucs.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Okay...?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Euh, OK... ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: You two share a lot of history...\. never would have guessed.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Vous avez vécu des choses ensemble....\. Je l'aurais jamais deviné.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Those times were...\. complicated.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Cette époque était...\. compliquée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Somehow...\. Lea reminded me of her.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: D'une certaine manière...\. Lea me rappelait d'elle.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Manuela couldn't talk either, you see?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Manuela ne pouvait pas parler non plus.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: The one person that felt close to us.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: La seule personne avec qui on se sentait proche.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yes...\. it was here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...\. c'était ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That person...\. I met him here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Cette personne...\. Je l'ai rencontré ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Let's have one last talk.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Parlons-nous une dernière fois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Tronny!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tronny !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Pull yourself together!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ressaisis-toi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Sergey.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Sergey.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: There is a hidden entrance behind those shelves.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il y a une entrée secrète derrière ces armoires.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Can you... open it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Est-ce tu... peux l'ouvrir ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Let me have a look...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Laisse-moi regarder...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Ah, that must be it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ah, ça doit être ça !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Just a moment...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Un moment...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Wha...\. What's back there?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quo...\. Il y a quoi là-bas ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This is creepy.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est effrayant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This was...\. where things ended for me.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était...\. là où les choses se sont terminées pour moi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I...\. can't remember any further.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je...\. J'arrive pas à me souvenir plus loin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: We have to go and see for ourselves.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il faut qu'on y aille et qu'on le découvre.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Alright, let's get this over with.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: OK, alors allons-y qu'on en finisse.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
By now, you should have realized 
your true circumstances.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Depuis, tu devrais t'être rendu compte
de tes véritables circonstances.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
You are just one of many 
that came before you.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Tu n'es qu'un parmi d'autres
qui sont venus avant toi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
The time has come 
to release you of your position.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Le temps est venu
de te congédier de tes tâches.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
I'm sure there is still information left 
that you decided not to share.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Je suis sûr qu'il y a encore des informations
que tu as décidé de ne pas partager.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
That is why this will be
your final interrogation.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
C'est pour cela que ce sera
ton dernier interrogatoire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: WHAT?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: QUOI ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What is this?!\. Why is Sidwell here?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Qu'est-ce qui se passe ?!\. Pourquoi Sidwell est ici ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It...\. it was him...\. All this time...\. I...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est...\. C'était lui...\. Depuis toujours...\. Je...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Pull yourself together, Tronny!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ressaisis-toi, Tronny !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It looks he's about to attack.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On dirait qu'il va attaquer.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: There...\. There is no point fighting him!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ça...\. Ça sert à rien de le combattre !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Really?\. We'll see about that!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Vraiment ?\. C'est ce qu'on va voir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: WE JUST BEAT HIM!!\. PUNCHED HIS FACE!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: ON L'A EU !!\. ON LUI A MIS UN POING DANS LA TRONCHE !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This was AWESOME!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était GÉNIAL !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I never expected we could just...\. defeat him.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je n'imaginais même pas qu'on pouvait...\. le vaincre.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I guess...\. it was just an enemy designed in his image.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'imagine...\. que c'était juste un ennemi conçu à son image.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: But still...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mais quand même...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Some of them...\. look exactly like you.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il y en a certains...\. qui sont exactement comme toi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yes...\. because I used to be just one of them.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...\. parce que j'ai été l'un d'eux.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I remember now.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je me souviens maintenant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Something I knew for some time now...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quelque chose que je savais depuis un moment...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Something I suppressed.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quelque chose que j'ai refoulé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: All this time...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pendant tout ce temps...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: When I was spying in CrossWorlds.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quand j'espionnais dans CrossWorlds.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: My whole existence...\. resided in this game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mon existence entière...\. était dans ce jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I'd also remember...\. that this whole procedure had repeated itself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je me suis aussi souvenu...\. que cette procédure entière s'était répétée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Several times.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Plusieurs fois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Sidwell...\. he'd create Evotars of himself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Sidwell...\. Il se créait des Évotars de lui-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Would tell them the narrative of the "long playing session".
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il leur raconterait l'histoire de la "longue session de jeu".

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: He then would use them as reliable and capable spies, within the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et ensuite il s'en servait comme espions fiables et compétents, dans le jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: For as long as it worked.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tant que ça marchait.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And once they finally did find out...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et une fois qu'ils s'en rendaient compte...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: He'd dispose of them.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Il se débarrassait d'eux.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: And that is what happened in this room.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et c'est ce qui est arrivé dans cette pièce.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It was my last interrogation.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'était mon dernier interrogatoire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: To make sure I didn't keep any secrets from the real me.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pour s'assurer, que je ne gardais aucun secret de mon moi véritable.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Damn, this is messed up.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Hé bien...\. quel bazar.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: C'tron...\. There is one thing I am still puzzled about.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'tron...\. Il y a encore une chose qui me turlupine.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: That is...\. why is your Evotar still here?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Pourquoi...\. Est-ce que ton Évotar est encore là ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It sounds like you experienced your interrogation here, so...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On dirait que tu as vécu ton interrogatoire ici, donc...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Would this not imply that your Evotar has been deleted?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: ... Est-ce que ça ne voudrait pas dire que ton Évotar aurait dû être détruit ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: You're right.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tu as raison.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I should have been deleted and in fact...\. I was.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'aurais dû être supprimé...\. Et en fait, je l'ai été.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: But...\. I found a loophole.\. And that's why I'm still here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mais...\. J'ai trouvé un contournement.\. Et c'est pour ça que je suis toujours là.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Maybe it's best if I just showed you.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Peut-être que ce serait mieux, si je vous montrais.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Let's go back to the new Meeting Room...\. M04-02.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Retournons dans la nouvelle salle de réunion...\. M04-02.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I already realized I was an Evotar, several weeks before I was deleted...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'avais déjà réalisé que j'étais un Évotar, plusieurs semaines avant d'être supprimé...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Lea, C'tron....
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Lea, C'tron....

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I had a closer look at this \c[3]Sidwell\c[0]...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'ai regardé de plus près ce \c[3]Sidwell\c[0]...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It is a scripted enemy using his avatar's appearance.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est un ennemi scripté qui utilise l'apparence de son avatar.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It looks like Gautham was involved in its creation.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On dirait que Gautham a été impliqué pour sa création.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This time, it is using a ridiculously large \c[3]defense boost\c[0] to negate your damage.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Cette fois, il utilise un \c[3]boost de défense\c[0] ridiculement élevé pour annuler vos dégâts.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I found a way to manipulate his \c[3]clones\c[0].\. Defeat them to boost your \c[3]attack\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: J'ai trouvé un moyen pour manipuler ses \c[3]clones\c[0].\. Abattez-les pour booster votre \c[3]attaque\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Also...\. make sure to tell Emilie.\. I cannot send her this message.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Et sinon...\. Dites-le à Émilie.\. Je ne peux pas lui envoyer ce message.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: O-\.Okay?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: O-\.OK ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Uhm...\. \c[3]Emilie\c[0]! Attack the \c[3]clones\c[0]! Sergey did a thing!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Euh...\. \c[3]Emilie\c[0] ! Attaque les \c[3]clones\c[0] ! Sergey a fait quelque chose !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What?\. Uhm...\. Alright, I guess?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quoi ?\. Euh...\. D'accord ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
You have been less active the last 
few days.\. Why is that?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Vous avez été moins actif ces derniers
jours.\. Comment ça se fait ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Answer the question!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Répondez à la question !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
We saw you communicating via message 
with an anonymous individual. 
Who was that?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
On vous a vu en train de communiquer
avec un individu anonyme.
C'était qui ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: There is no point in being silent!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ça ne sert à rien de se taire !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
You neglected the surveillance 
of interrogation target 78 and 94. 
Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Vous avez négligé la surveillance
des cibles d'interrogatoire 78 et 94.
Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: This will continue until I get answers.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ça va durer tant je n'aurais pas eu de réponses.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig:
You used certain characteristic 
hand gestures public. 
Why did you do that?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text:
Vous avez utilisé certaines gestuelles
caractéristique des mains en public.
Pourquoi avoir fait ça ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Answer or this will go on for hours and hours.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Répondez, ou ça continuera pendant des heures et des heures.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: TAKE THAT, YOU JERK!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: PRENDS ÇA, SALE CRAPULE !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It looks like he's increasing his defense again!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On dirait qu'il augmente encore sa défense !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Dang it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mince !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: We're barely doing damage!\. What is this?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: On fait quasiment pas de dégâts !\. C'est quoi ce truc ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: I told you it's useless...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Je vous l'ai dit, c'est inutile...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Well...\. we won't give up this easily!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: BAH !\. On va pas abandonner si facilement !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Oh...\. No!\. Nonononono!\. Please!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oh...\. Non !\. Nononononon !\. Pas ça !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Tronny!!! Are you okay?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tronny !!! Tu vas bien ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It...\. It's the interogation!\. Please...\. you have to stop it!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est...\. C'est l'interrogatoire !\. Pitié...\. vous devez l'arrêter !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: How?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Comment ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: No!\. Not again!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Non !\. Pas encore !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Don't worry, Tronny!\. We can beat the clones before they attack you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: T'inquiète pas, Tronny !\. On peut battre les clones avant qu'ils t'attaquent !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Lea!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Lea !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Again?!\. Why is it always me?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Encore ?!\. Pourquoi c'est toujours moi ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Maybe because you're his Evotar and he doesn't like it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Peut-être parce que tu es son Évotar et qu'il n'aime pas ça ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Right...\. of course...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui...\. Naturellement...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Gosh!\. When is this finally over?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Mon dieu !\. Quand est-ce que ça se termine ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Not much longer!\. We got plenty of clones to beat now!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Plus pour longtemps !\. On a plein de clones à cogner là !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Hurray...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Hourra...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Ahhhhh...\. W-Wait...\. It didn't hurt?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ahhhhh...\. A-Attends...\. J'ai pas eu mal ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Don't worry, you're using regular pain sensors.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, tu utilises des capteurs de douleur normaux.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Sorry!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Désolée !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: It's fine.\. Fortunately it doesn't hurt.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: C'est bon.\. Heureusement ça n'a pas fait mal.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Whoops!\. Missed one!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ouuups !\. Un de raté !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Yeah, I noticed.
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oui, j'ai remarqué.

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Oh...\. missed another one!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oh...\. Encore un de raté !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Okay...
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: OK...

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Whooops!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Ouuups !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Sorry!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Désolée !

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Oh!\. We can beat the clones!\. And they make us stronger!\. Awesome!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Oh !\. On peut vaincre les clones !\. Et ils nous rendent plus forts !\. Fantastique !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: Your days are numbered, Sidwell!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Tes jours sont comptés, Sidwell !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: What?
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: Quoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.orig: \s[5]Whaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaat?!?!?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.text: \s[5]Quooooooooooooooooooooooooi ?!?!?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/arid/lab/u.note: the length checker complains about this text, is the original also broken ?
